company.title: Company
company.subtitle: About Neiom Systems
company.description:
Neiom Systems is developing text-to-speech technology for the Luxembourgish language. Our mission is to make Luxembourgish content accessible through high-quality voice synthesis.

**What We Do**

We create text-to-speech solutions that:
• Generate natural-sounding Luxembourgish audio
• Support accessibility for digital content
• Enable cost-effective audio production
• Preserve the unique character of Luxembourgish

**Our Technology**

Our TTS system is designed specifically for Luxembourgish, capturing the language's unique pronunciation and intonation patterns.

**Contact Us**

For more information, please contact us at vhenz@college.harvard.edu

careers.title: Careers
careers.subtitle: Join our team!
careers.description: Interested in joining us? Contact us at vhenz@college.harvard.edu

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet the co-founders behind Neiom Systems

vivien.name: Vivien Henz
vivien.description: Vivien leads our technical development with expertise in machine learning design, tokenization, and data processing. His deep understanding of language technology drives our mission to create the most natural-sounding Luxembourgish text-to-speech system.

mark.name: Mark McDonald
mark.description: Mark oversees our business strategy, financial operations, and marketing initiatives. His expertise in business development and linguistic model training ensures our technology solutions align with market needs while advancing Luxembourgish language preservation.

mission.missionContent:
Neiom Systems is developing text-to-speech technology for the Luxembourgish language. Our mission is to make Luxembourgish content accessible through high-quality voice synthesis.

**What We Do**

We create text-to-speech solutions that:
• Generate natural-sounding Luxembourgish audio
• Support accessibility for digital content
• Enable cost-effective audio production
• Preserve the unique character of Luxembourgish

**Our Technology**

Our TTS system is designed specifically for Luxembourgish, capturing the language's unique pronunciation and intonation patterns.

**Contact Us**

For more information, please contact us at vhenz@college.harvard.edu
mission.technologyContent:
Our Luxembourgish text-to-speech technology is built on advanced machine learning models trained specifically on Luxembourgish language data.

**Technical Features**

• Neural network-based voice synthesis
• Real-time audio generation
• High-quality output (44.1kHz)
• Customizable voice parameters
• API integration support

**Performance**

• Sub-second generation time
• Natural pronunciation patterns
• Consistent voice characteristics
• Scalable infrastructure

**Integration**

• RESTful API endpoints
• SDK support for developers
• Cloud-based processing
• Enterprise-grade security
mission.contactContent:
Ready to integrate Luxembourgish text-to-speech into your project? We're here to help you get started.

**Get Started**

• Free consultation call
• Custom integration support
• Technical documentation
• Sample implementations

**Support**

• Developer resources
• API documentation
• Best practices guide
• Community forum

**Contact Information**

Email: vhenz@college.harvard.edu
Response time: Within 24 hours

For enterprise inquiries, please schedule a consultation call.
